entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 30 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 10. POP 30%
